content: In 2021 which Puerto Rican singer released the hit song "Dákiti" featuring Jhay Cortez and later won multiple awards at the Latin Grammy Awards?

I believe the Puerto Rican singer who released "Dákiti" in 2021, featuring Jhay Cortez, and went on to win multiple awards at the Latin Grammy Awards is Bad Bunny. He's a very popular artist known for his unique style and music. I think "Dákiti" was part of his album "El Último Tour Del Mundo." He has been receiving a lot of recognition lately for his work in the music industry.
